department.dept_long_name: Committee on the Study of Religion

course.title: Doctoral Colloquium in Religion, Gender, and Culture
course.description: The Religion, Gender, and Culture Colloquium explores the intersections of feminist theory with feminist theologies and gender studies in religion.
course.notes: Required for doctoral students in Religion, Gender, and Culture. Interested ThM, MTS, and MDiv students please contact the instructor. May be taken on a Sat/Unsat basis only. Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 2690.
